mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (reply_content, member_profile_id, work_id, star) values (#{replyContent}, #{memberProfileId}, #{workId}, #{star})
mapper.select: select r.id, r.reply_content, r.member_profile_id, r.work_id, r.created_date as createDate, r.star, mp.profile_nickname as profileNickname, m.profile_img_url as profileImgUrl from tbl_reply r join tbl_member_profile mp on r.member_profile_id = mp.id join tbl_member m on mp.member_id = m.id where r.work_id = #{workId} order by r.created_date desc limit #{pagination.startRow}, #{pagination.rowCount}
